longBusinessSummary: Fathom Nickel Inc., an exploration stage company, engages in identification, acquisition, and exploration of the base and precious metals for use in electric vehicle and battery markets. The company primarily explores for nickel, copper, palladium, and platinum deposits. Its flagship project is the Albert Lake Project which consists of 31 mineral claims covering an area of 90,460 hectares located in the La Ronge Mining District of Saskatchewan, Canada; and the Friesen Lake property that encompasses three mineral dispositions covering an area of 10,133 hectares located near the northwest of the historic Gochager Lake deposit. The company is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
